cmp: 回 ((a measure word for matters or actions) a time/to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Islam)
mng: a flock of sheep (or goats), old variant of 膻[shan1], old variant of 羶[shan1]

exm.mng: like ants pursuing a stink (idiom); the mob chases the rich and powerful, the crowd runs after trash
